cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port to a negative value will cause socket binding failure and prevent CU from establishing F1 connection.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local network port to a negative value will cause socket binding failure and prevent DU from establishing F1 connection.
du.explanation_zh: 將本地網路端口設定為負值會導致套接字綁定失敗，並阻止 DU 建立 F1 連接。
